pullRequest.body:
Replace them by the equivalent `simp` call and squeeze that. We leave `field_simp` calls slower than roughly 150ms in place. A few calls cannot easily be replaced; we leave these alone as well.

Speeds up all affected files, including `Euclidean/Circumcenter` by 4%, `Inversion/Basic` by 27% and `Triangle` by 52%.

---

This is not a replacement for a field_simp rewrite, but leaving these really slow calls in place until then doesn't seem like an improvement either. I'm happy to file a tracking issue for this.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body: !bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/c3a02378-6fc5-46c2-a3c9-f3177a9a1af9) for commit 407078cc365170df953516cc1a0d63aac5dc5ee8.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/21f20449-0fec-4ab2-81f6-4c840c27f090/to/c3a02378-6fc5-46c2-a3c9-f3177a9a1af9) against commit 7aa5faafc8815ed358053e05f51f4aea8e47f4e2:
```diff
  Benchmark                              Metric         Change
  ============================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Euclidean.Triangle   instructions   -44.4%
```

Let's have a tracking issue, and link to it from all these places. I'm a bit afraid of scattering comments across so many files without a way to collect them all again when we fix the underlying problem.
:+1: Creating and referencing this tracking issue is on my list of "clean up loose ends once my PhD thesis is submitted" :-)

### PR summary [50f20c09f8](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13497/commits/50f20c09f8bdbabf2855626efcd88dd7471771a3)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

I have created #15486 and referenced it in all the comments. Two more slow calls can in fact replaced by simp now.
This is ready for review again.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/aaaa436b-8cf3-47b7-a82a-e0c025e97e13) for commit 50f20c09f8bdbabf2855626efcd88dd7471771a3.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/0e475d8f-d0b1-4bfa-8e65-3be4c75e9e7e/to/aaaa436b-8cf3-47b7-a82a-e0c025e97e13) against commit 79df738051ef1376db92aa53f64d151b5a62e884:
```diff
  Benchmark                              Metric         Change
  ============================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Euclidean.Triangle   instructions   -52.7%
```

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10354818961/job/28660988822)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10354818961/job/28660989808)
Happy to revert this one, if the change is not considered worth it.
Could you expand the comment? It's not clear that you mean the equivalent simp call doesn't work!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - perf(Geometry/Euclidean): squeeze slow field_simp calls
